cat_item.display_value: Enable PING functionality for Assignment Group

catalog_script_client.name: Show corresponding questions

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_11f4ffd4479b2110a9b7057d826d431d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Enable PING functionality for Assignment Group">dcfaa31c475b2110a9b7057d826d43bc</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:855b2b1c475b2110a9b7057d826d43c5</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Show corresponding questions</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	if (newValue == "rest_message") {
		hideEmailOptions();
	} else if (newValue == "email") {
		hideRestOptions();
	}
	
	function hideEmailOptions() {
		g_form.setVisible("api_key", true);
		g_form.setVisible("rest_url", true);
		g_form.setVisible("email", false);
	}
	
	function hideRestOptions() {
		g_form.setVisible("email", true);
		g_form.setVisible("api_key", false);
		g_form.setVisible("rest_url", false);
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-04 13:58:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>11f4ffd4479b2110a9b7057d826d431d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show corresponding questions</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ping Services" source="x_670518_ping_serv">82262b54475b2110a9b7057d826d436f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ping Services">82262b54475b2110a9b7057d826d436f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_11f4ffd4479b2110a9b7057d826d431d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-04 14:00:45</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
